IBM X-Force ID: 135519.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1749.title: IBM UrbanCode Deploy directory traversal
CVE-2017-1749.body: IBM UrbanCode Deploy 6.1 through 6.9.6.0 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An unauthenticated attacker could alter UCD deployments. IBM X-Force ID: 135522.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin C1000374 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1750.title: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) cross-site scripting
CVE-2017-1750.body: IBM Jazz Reporting Service (JRS) 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 135523.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1751.title: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere cross-site scripting
CVE-2017-1751.body: IBM Robotic Process Automation with Automation Anywhere 10.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 135546.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 2011185 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1752.title: IBM UrbanCode Deploy information disclosure
CVE-2017-1752.body: IBM UrbanCode Deploy 6.1 and 6.2 could allow an authenticated privileged user to obtain highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 135547.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1756.title: IBM Business Process Manager information disclosure
CVE-2017-1756.body: IBM Business Process Manager 8.6 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 135856.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2017-1757.title: IBM Security Guardium SQL injection
CVE-2017-1757.body: IBM Security Guardium 10.0 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 135858.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

IBM X-Force ID: 136005.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1774.title: IBM Security Guardium information disclosure
CVE-2017-1774.body: IBM Security Guardium Big Data Intelligence (SonarG) 3.1 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 136818.Refer to IBM Security Bulletin 2013595 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1783.title: IBM Cognos Analytics improper access control
CVE-2017-1783.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 could allow a local user to change parameters set from the Cognos Analytics menus without proper authentication. IBM X-Force ID: 136857.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1784.title: IBM Cognos Analytics information disclosure
CVE-2017-1784.body: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.0 could produce results in temporary files that contain highly sensitive information that can be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 136858.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2017-1785.title: IBM API Connect information disclosure

CVE-2017-1789.title: IBM Tivoli Monitoring code execution

CVE-2017-2575.title: libbpg BPG encoder denial of service
CVE-2017-2575.body: libbpg is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the BPG encoder. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.No remedy available as of April 20, 2017.

CVE-2017-3191.title: D-Link DIR-130 and DIR-330 tools_admin.asp security bypass
CVE-2017-3191.body: D-Link DIR-130 and DIR-330 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper validation of HTTP POST request by the tools_admin.asp script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP POST request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass access restriction and gain access to the tools_admin.asp without credentials.No remedy available as of March 15, 2017.

CVE-2017-7957.title: XStream denial of service
CVE-2017-7957.body: XStream is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of attempts to create an instance of the primitive type 'void' during unmarshalling. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Refer to XStream Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2017-9819.title: National Payments Corporation of India BHIM application for Android security bypass
CVE-2017-9819.body: National Payments Corporation of India BHIM application for Android could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly restrict use of the OTP feature. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication.No remedy available as of August 21, 2018.

CVE-2017-9820.title: National Payments Corporation of India BHIM application for Android security bypass
CVE-2017-9820.body: National Payments Corporation of India BHIM application for Android could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the use of a custom keypad. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication.No remedy available as of August 21, 2018.
